template.description: Scientific Linux 6.4 x86_64 for CERN AI

/dev/vda1 / ext4 defaults,noatime 0 0 devpts /dev/pts devpts gid=5,mode=620 0 0 tmpfs /dev/shm tmpfs defaults 0 0 proc /proc proc defaults 0 0 sysfs /sys sysfs defaults 0 0
NETWORKING=yes NOZEROCONF=yes
DEVICE=eth0 BOOTPROTO=dhcp ONBOOT=yes TYPE=Ethernet
/DC=ch/DC=cern/OU=computers/CN=lcg-voms.cern.ch /DC=ch/DC=cern/CN=CERN Trusted Certification Authority
/DC=ch/DC=cern/OU=computers/CN=voms.cern.ch /DC=ch/DC=cern/CN=CERN Trusted Certification Authority
export CMS_LOCAL_SITE=T2_CH_CERN_AI
CVMFS_REPOSITORIES=cms.cern.ch,grid.cern.ch CVMFS_HTTP_PROXY="http://ca-proxy.cern.ch:3128;http://lxbrb1413.cern.ch:3128|http://lxbrb1414.cern.ch:3128" CVMFS_QUOTA_LIMIT=10000
LOGFILE=/var/log/cloudconfig.log VIRTUAL_DISKS="vdb xvdb sda2 sdb"
#!/bin/sh # CMS environment settings export VO_CMS_SW_DIR="/cvmfs/cms.cern.ch" export VO_CMS_DEFAULT_SE="srm-eoscms.cern.ch" export SITE_NAME="T2_CH_CERN_AI"
# where to look for modules path = /usr/lib64/lcmaps
# module definitions verify_proxy = "lcmaps_verify_proxy.mod" " -certdir /etc/grid-security/certificates/" " --allow-limited-proxy"
pepc = "lcmaps_c_pep.mod" " --pep-daemon-endpoint-url https://site-argus.cern.ch:8154/authz" " -resourceid http://authz-interop.org/xacml/resource/resource-type/wn" " -actionid http://glite.org/xacml/action/execute" " -capath /etc/grid-security/certificates/" " -pep-certificate-mode implicit" " --use-pilot-proxy-as-cafile"
glexec_get_account: verify_proxy -> pepc
[glexec] silent_logging = no log_level = 5 user_white_list = glidein_pilot linger = yes user_identity_switch_by = glexec use_lcas = no lcmaps_db_file = /etc/lcmaps/lcmaps-glexec.db lcmaps_log_file = /var/log/lcas_lcmaps.log lcmaps_debug_level = 5 lcmaps_log_level = 5 lcmaps_get_account_policy = glexec_get_account lcmaps_verify_account_policy = glexec_verify_account
lcas_db_file = /etc/lcas/lcas-glexec.db lcas_log_file = /var/log/lcas_lcmaps.log lcas_debug_level = 5 lcas_log_level = 5 preserve_env_variables = no log_destination = file
[DEFAULT] contextualize_protocol = EC2 default_max_lifetime = 172800 ec2_url = http://169.254.169.254/latest/user-data
[GLIDEIN_USER] user_name = glidein_pilot user_home = /home/glidein_pilot
[DIRECTORIES] pre_script_dir = /usr/libexec/glideinwms_pilot/PRE post_script_dir = /usr/libexec/glideinwms_pilot/POST
[CUSTOM_ENVIRONMENT] VO_CMS_SW_DIR = /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch VO_CMS_DEFAULT_SE = srm-eoscms.cern.ch SITE_NAME = T2_CH_CERN_AI
file:///root/OzImages/cern_ai_sl6_x86_64/rc.local
file:///root/OzImages/cern_ai_sl6_x86_64/config_users
file:///root/OzImages/cern_ai_sl6_x86_64/users.conf
file:///root/OzImages/cern_ai_sl6_x86_64/mount_ephemeral
file:///root/OzImages/cern_ai_sl6_x86_64/sshd_config
/file>

commands.command: chmod +w /etc/sudoers sed -i 's/Defaults requiretty/#Defaults requiretty/g' /etc/sudoers echo "%wheel ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" >> /etc/sudoers chmod -w /etc/sudoers
yum clean all yum -y --nogpgcheck install ca-policy-egi-core yum -y --nogpgcheck install emi-wn yum -y --nogpgcheck install emi-glexec_wn yum -y --nogpgcheck install HEP_OSlibs_SL6

yum -y install cvmfs-keys cvmfs cvmfs-init-scripts chmod +r /etc/cvmfs/config.d/cms.cern.ch.local chmod +r /etc/cvmfs/default.local /usr/bin/cvmfs_config setup /sbin/service autofs start /sbin/chkconfig autofs on

mkdir /data chmod +x /etc/rc.d/rc.local chmod +r /etc/grid-security/vomsdir/cms/lcg-voms.cern.ch.lsc chmod +r /etc/grid-security/vomsdir/cms/voms.cern.ch.lsc chmod g+r /etc/lcmaps/lcmaps-glexec.db chown root.glexec /etc/glexec.conf chmod g+r /etc/glexec.conf chmod +r /etc/glideinwms/glidein-pilot.ini
